>>>>>>> 4140f24734dc43a0cec843110b40849f867f6944

Remove all comments from a given java method. Code from https://stackoverflow.com/a/241506/5768407.

:param mthd: the method to have its comments removed :returns: returns the method with its comments removed

transform_df[source]

transform_df(df:DataFrame, transform:Callable, n:Optional[int]=None)

=======

transform_df[source]

transform_df(df:DataFrame, transform:Callable, n:Optional[int]=None)

>>>>>>> 4140f24734dc43a0cec843110b40849f867f6944

Transform the given pandas dataframe using the given transformation.

:param df: the dataframe containing each method to be transformed :param transform: the transformation that will be applied to each method in the dataframe :param n: the number of methods to evaluate. If none, the entire dataframe will be used :returns: returns a modified dataframe with the methods transformed
